reg_info.act_under: Electricity Act, 1998   Loi de 1998 sur l’électricité

content.content: 1. For the purposes of Part VII of the Act, January 1, 2000 is the changeover date prescribed under subsection 97 (3) of the Act. O. Reg. 632/99, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purposes of Part VII of the Act, January 1, 2000 is the changeover date prescribed under subsection 97 (3) of the Act. O. Reg. 632/99, s. 1.

content.content: 2. December 31, 1999 is prescribed as the commencement date for the pension plans established under subsection 102 (1) of the Act by the IMO, the Generation Corporation, the Services Corporation and the Electrical Safety Authority. O. Reg. 632/99, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. December 31, 1999 is prescribed as the commencement date for the pension plans established under subsection 102 (1) of the Act by the IMO, the Generation Corporation, the Services Corporation and the Electrical Safety Authority. O. Reg. 632/99, s. 2.
